context_of_use: This use case allows users to view and download general and sales-related reports within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to view and download reports
user: wants to analyze data offline
admin: wants to monitor business performance
description: This use case enables users to view and download reports for analysis and monitoring purposes.
triggering_event: User requests to view or download reports.
preconditions: User has permission to access reports
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to view and download reports
Reports are available in the system
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view reports
The system shall allow users to download reports
outstanding_issues: Clarification on report types available for viewing and downloading
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to view reports → System displays available reports.
2. User selects a report to download → System initiates download of the selected report.
3. Admin requests to view sales reports → System displays sales reports.
